alert.note: Alert for Christian (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 22 at 3:18PM CST until February 22 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHRISTIAN...MOULTRIE AND SHELBY COUNTIES... At 317 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Assumption to 6 miles south of Tower Hill, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, Westervelt, Findlay, Bethany, Stewardson, Sullivan, Lovington, Windsor and Allenville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
